name: In Time (Murat Serhat Alperen)
description:
You are supposed to solve the puzzles by getting into VR mode to unlocking doors.

Made by four people in 24 hours (yes, 24!) for the Esas Expo Game Hackathon (https://esasexpo.org/) and took 2nd place!

Contributors:

Negrican Sandalcı - Project Manager

Alperen Sayın - Game Designer

Kıvanç Ünver - Art

Murat Serhat Alperen - Developer

Controls:

Move with WASD.

Interact with left click.
